about_the_game:
🃏 Unique Roguelike Deckbuilding Strategy Single-play Role-playing Card Game

In Lost Pages, play with an entirely new and unique original deckbuilding system. The elemental deckbuilding system we've devised doesn't involve random card draws but instead requires a random draw of resources (elements of fire, water, earth, air) to use spells. This novel approach was recognized for its originality at the Google Indie Game Festival, offering a completely new deckbuilding experience.


🌈 Ether Element System

Going beyond just drawing elements, a distinctive element called Ether makes the game even more rich. The nature of the Ether element is determined at the moment it is drawn, and it always triggers a draw of another element, potentially leading to a chain draw.


🏒 Overwhelming Variation and Freedom

Lost Pages boasts an incredible number of various magic circles, artifacts, and runes. Depending on the user's choices, the deck changes freely. Such variation and freedom keep the gameplay constantly engaging, combined with the user's growing stats, offering unimaginably diverse experiences.


⚔️ 106 Levels for Endless Challenges

Clearing just the six basic levels is a significant challenge, but the 100 levels of the Dimensional Gate mode remain as a goal for players to strive for, even years after release.


🎬 Unique Story and Beautiful Animation

Lost Pages is the first installment in a series, grounded in a profound universe centered around the birth of the moon. Currently, it includes eight original animations, with more captivating story animations continuously being added.

short_description: In this roguelike deck-building game, uncover ancient secrets in dark mist. Build your deck with magic circles and artifacts, battle monsters, and plan routes on a shifting map. Face the 100 levels of the dimensional gate. Grow and take on new challenges as you progress.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
